class.name: DiscordActivityAssets
class.brief_description: Struct which controls what your rich presence looks like in the Discord client. If you don't specify any values, the icon and name of your application will be used as defaults.
class.description: Image assets can be either the unique identifier for an image you uploaded to your application via the [code]Rich Presence[/code] page in the Developer portal, or they can be an external image URL. As an example, if I uploaded an asset and name it [code]goofy-icon[/code], I could set either image field to the string [code]goofy-icon[/code]. Alternatively, if my icon was hosted at [url=http://my-site.com/goofy.jpg][code]http://my-site.com/goofy.jpg[/code][/url], I could pass that URL into either image field. See [url=https://discord.com/developers/docs/rich-presence/overview#adding-custom-art-assets]https://discord.com/developers/docs/rich-presence/overview#adding-custom-art-assets[/url] for more information on using custom art assets, as well as for visual examples of what each field does.

method.name: invite_cover_image
method.description: The invite cover image identifier or URL, rendered as a banner image on activity invites. If specified, must be a string between 1 and 300 characters. Returns [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: large_image
method.description: The primary image identifier or URL, rendered as a large square icon on a user's rich presence. If specified, must be a string between 1 and 300 characters. Returns [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: large_text
method.description: A tooltip string that is shown when the user hovers over the large image. If specified, must be a string between 2 and 128 characters. Returns [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: large_url
method.description: A URL that opens when the user clicks/taps the large image. If specified, must be a string between 1 and 256 characters. Returns [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: set_invite_cover_image
method.description: Setter for [method DiscordActivityAssets.invite_cover_image]. Parameter [param invite_cover_image] can be [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: set_large_image
method.description: Setter for [method DiscordActivityAssets.large_image]. Parameter [param large_image] can be [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: set_large_text
method.description: Setter for [method DiscordActivityAssets.large_text]. Parameter [param large_text] can be [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: set_large_url
method.description: Setter for [method DiscordActivityAssets.large_url]. Parameter [param large_url] can be [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: set_small_image
method.description: Setter for [method DiscordActivityAssets.small_image]. Parameter [param small_image] can be [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: set_small_text
method.description: Setter for [method DiscordActivityAssets.small_text]. Parameter [param small_text] can be [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: set_small_url
method.description: Setter for [method DiscordActivityAssets.small_url]. Parameter [param small_url] can be [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: small_image
method.description: The secondary image, rendered as a small circle over the [code]largeImage[/code]. If specified, must be a string between 1 and 300 characters. Returns [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: small_text
method.description: A tooltip string that is shown when the user hovers over the small image. If specified, must be a string between 2 and 128 characters. Returns [String] or [code]null[/code].

method.name: small_url
method.description: A URL that opens when the user clicks/taps the small image. If specified, must be a string between 1 and 256 characters. Returns [String] or [code]null[/code].
